name: Beneath the Sins - PROTOTYPE
description:
Prototyope of my first fluid RPG game, in order to create a real one.

Made with Game Maker Studio 2.

Thanks to clembod and surt for their free assets ! <3

Duration : around 5 - 10 minutes

WARNING : This prototype is not a real game, there is no scenario, no objective. It only allows you to test the potential of the gameplay (movements, interactions, fights, ...). There is no goal and no end, you can do whatever you want. Enjoy :)

Please give me a FEEDBACK, this is important in order to improve the game !! It's the objective of this prototype, don't hesitate to comment your feedback !

____________________________________________________

KEYS

menu movement: ZQSD or top_keypad left_keypad down_keypad right_keypad

move left : Q or left_keypad

move right: D or right_keypad

jump: space

attacks (3 combo attack): B or 1

slide: N or 2 depending on speed of the character

pause menu: escape

confirm: space

restart the game: R
